text: @NikkiHaley @realDonaldTrump @VP @NikkiHaley, how stupid do you think the American citizens are? The Forever Impeached & Incompetent @POTUS  called the Coronavirus a HOAX! @realDonaldTrump tweeted today about his ratings while nurses in NY are loading bodies in refrigerator semi trucks. @GOP sycophant LIARS! https://t.co/UMiapwC8Lp

entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with information and advice from the prime minister, state and federal governments, health authorities and other trusted sources from around Australia. For more, visit https://www.health.gov.au/.
